questions.question_text: In which two ways does FortiGate learn the FortiManager IP address or FQDN for zero-touch provisioning? (Choose two.)

choices.D: FortiGate has not received three consecutive requests from the SLA server configured for port2.
choices.A: The dead member interface stays unavailable until an administrator manually brings the interface back.
choices.C: Static routes using port2 are active in the routing table.
choices.B: Port2 needs to wait 500 milliseconds to change the status from alive to dead.

D is correct
